title: Providing relief to pensioners, paddy farmers and fishermen
decision_details: - Cabinet approved the proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Economic Development, Policy Formulation, Planning and Tourism to manage, as appropriate, the provisions required to implement the Cabinet decisions taken to provide a monthly interim allowance of Rs.3,000/- for all pensioners, to increase the fertilizer subsidy up to Rs.25,000/- per hectare to a maximum of 2 hectares for farmers cultivating paddy in the Maha Season 2024/25, and to provide a financial assistance to fishing vessel owners, through the provisions allocated under the Development Programme of the Department of National Budget.
